Question: This person's views became more radical as he grew older.
Hints: All modern American literature comes from one book by this person called Huckleberry Finn.
This person grew up in Hannibal, Missouri, which provided the setting for Huckleberry Finn and Tom Sawyer.
In it, he also states that "this person" was the call made when the boat was in safe water – two fathoms (12 feet or 3.7 metres).
